name: MirrorMirror
0:
”Alexa, ask mirror on the wall”
”Alexa, ask mirror on the wall am I looking good?”
”Alexa, ask mirror on the wall who is the best player on the team?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mirror on the wall
des:
Let Alexa cheer you up! 

Simply say 'Alexa, ask mirror on the wall!' after enabling the skill. Alexa will pay you a compliment of her pick. 

Having doubt about yourself? Let Mirror Mirror give you a second opinion. You may ask mirror on the wall 'Am I ...... ?', or 'Who is ...... ? ' For example: 

You: "Alexa, ask mirror on the wall. "
Alexa: "Hey, you've outdone yourself."

You: "Alexa, ask mirror on the wall am I looking good?"
Alexa: "You are looking good."

You; "Alexa, ask mirror on the wall am I stupid?"
Alexa: "No, you are not. Never doubt yourself."

You: "Alexa, ask mirror on the wall who is the fairest one of all?
Alexa: "You, are the fairest one of all."

You: "Alexa, ask mirror on the wall who is the most powerful?"
Alexa: "You, my majesty, are the most powerful."

You: "Alexa, ask mirror on the wall who is the most stupid?"
Alexa: "I'm sorry. I don't know such people."


If there is any complimentary phrases you would like to see added, please email mirror.mirror.alexa@gmail.com.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
